channel.title: Changing picture in client
channel.description:
i created today an client but he got old admin picture... i did look in the "sprite" folder but there isnt an admin picture into it... how do i set my own one on the client?
admin picture = the admin krean in-game when an admin is talking in chatbox.

item.title: Changing picture in client
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
